page.title: 06THORNSETT SCHOOL,THORNSETT
page.content: Thornsett C.P.School was built in 1878 and it is dug into the moors.If you look carefully you can see where they started building the walls.The school was built on a hill and if the tall wall wasn't there the moor would just fall down.When we have sports we have to walk from our school to Derby field about a mile away.There are fields surrounding us but we're not allowed to use them.We have no gym in our school because it isn't big enough, our playgrounds are not very big and they aren't linked together so to get from one playground to another we have to go through our school.We have a staff room built up in the ceiling The old staffroom is now a T.V.room. At the far end there is a bench which we can sit on at playtimes.
